front.title: Clarifications and Updates on using Static Context Header Compression (SCHC) for the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP)

abstract.t: This document clarifies, updates and extends the method specified in RFC 8824 for compressing Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) headers using the Static Context Header Compression and fragmentation (SCHC) framework. In particular, it considers recently defined CoAP options and specifies how CoAP headers are compressed in the presence of intermediaries. Therefore, this document updates RFC 8824.
